sqlMap.select: SELECT /* TMMA0090.SEARCH00 */ CALN_DATE /* 달력일 */ , WDAY_CODE /* 요일코드 */ , HOGB_CODE /* 휴일구분코드 */ , SF_GET_COMMNAME('HOGB_CODE',HOGB_CODE) AS HOGB_NAME /* 휴일명 */ , LUNA_DATE /* 음력일 */ FROM TM_CALDXM WHERE CALN_DATE LIKE #STDS_YEAR#||'%' ORDER BY CALN_DATE ASC

SELECT /* TMMA0090.SEARCH01 */ CALN_DATE /* 달력일 */ , WDAY_CODE /* 요일코드 */ , HOGB_CODE /* 휴일구분코드 */ , SF_GET_COMMNAME('HOGB_CODE',HOGB_CODE) AS HOGB_NAME , LUNA_DATE /* 음력일 */ FROM TM_CALDXM WHERE CALN_DATE LIKE #STDS_YMTH#||'%' ORDER BY CALN_DATE ASC

SELECT /* TMMA0090.SEARCH02 */ CALN_DATE /* 달력일 */ , WDAY_CODE /* 요일코드 */ , HOGB_CODE /* 휴일구분코드 */ , SF_GET_COMMNAME('HOGB_CODE',HOGB_CODE) AS HOGB_NAME , LUNA_DATE /* 음력일 */ FROM TM_CALDXM WHERE CALN_DATE LIKE #STDS_YMTH#||'%' AND HOGB_CODE NOT IN ('01','02') /* 휴일구분코드: 01.평일, 02.법정공휴일 */ ORDER BY CALN_DATE ASC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TM_CALDXM ( /* TMMA0090.SAVE00 */ CALN_DATE /* 달력일 */ ,WDAY_CODE /* 요일코드 */ ,HOGB_CODE /* 휴일구분코드 */ ,LUNA_DATE /* 음력일 */ ,INST_USID /* 입력작업자 */ ,INST_DATE /* 입력일시 */ ,UPDT_USID /* 수정작업자 */ ,UPDT_DATE /* 수정일시 */ ) SELECT A.CALN_DATE ,A.WDAY_CODE ,NVL(CASE WHEN LEAD(B.REF3_FILD) OVER (ORDER BY A.CALN_DATE) = '3' THEN LEAD(B.COMD_CODE) OVER (ORDER BY A.CALN_DATE) WHEN LAG(B.REF3_FILD) OVER (ORDER BY A.CALN_DATE) = '3' THEN LAG(B.COMD_CODE) OVER (ORDER BY A.CALN_DATE) ELSE B.COMD_CODE END, A.HOGB_CODE) AS HOBO_CODE ,A.LUNA_DATE ,#UPDT_USID# ,SYSDATE ,#UPDT_USID# ,SYSDATE FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(X.DAYS, 'YYYYMMDD') AS CALN_DATE ,TO_CHAR(X.DAYS, 'D') AS WDAY_CODE ,CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(X.DAYS, 'D') = '1' OR TO_CHAR(X.DAYS, 'D') = '7' THEN '02' ELSE '01' END AS HOGB_CODE ,Y.LUNA_DATE FROM ( SELECT A.START_DATE + LEVEL - 1 AS DAYS FROM (SELECT TO_DATE(#STDS_YEAR# || '0101', 'YYYYMMDD') AS START_DATE ,TO_DATE(#STDS_YEAR# || '1231', 'YYYYMMDD') AS END_DATE FROM DUAL) A CONNECT BY LEVEL <= END_DATE - START_DATE + 1 ) X INNER JOIN TM_CALNDR Y ON TO_CHAR(X.DAYS, 'YYYYMMDD') = Y.CALN_DATE ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CODEXD B ON ( SUBSTR(A.CALN_DATE,5,4) = DECODE(B.REF2_FILD, '+', B.REF1_FILD,'') OR SUBSTR(A.LUNA_DATE,5,4) = DECODE(B.REF2_FILD, '-', B.REF1_FILD,'') ) AND B.COMM_CODE = 'HOGB_CODE' WHERE A.CALN_DATE BETWEEN GREATEST(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), #STDS_YEAR# || '0101') AND #STDS_YEAR# || '1231'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ROWCNT FROM TM_CALDXM WHERE SUBSTR(CALN_DATE, 0, 4) = #STDS_YEAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TM_CALDXM /* TMMA0090.UPDATE00 */ SET HOGB_CODE = #HOGB_CODE# /* 휴일구분코드 */ WHERE CALN_DATE = #CALN_DATE# /* 달력일 */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TM_CALDXM /* TMMA0090.DELETE00 */ WHERE CALN_DATE BETWEEN GREATEST(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), #STDS_YEAR# || '0101') AND #STDS_YEAR# || '1231'
